entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, especially across southern and western Uinta County. Expect 1 to 3 inches east of Leroy and Fort Bridger. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued April 11 at 3:59AM MDT until April 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MDT Wednesday.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 3:59AM MDT until April 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS

entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, highest amounts generally near and west of highway 50. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern Campbell County.

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 3:57AM MDT until April 13 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TUESDAY TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches, highest amounts generally over the higher elevations and favored northern facing slopes. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph, especially on Wednesday.

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued April 11 at 3:57AM MDT until April 14 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Most of the snow will fall late tonight through early Wednesday. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, with the strongest winds expected on Wednesday.

entry.title: High Wind Watch issued April 11 at 3:53AM MDT until April 12 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County and North Snowy Range Foothills.
